title: [ICE] Couldn't translate Aggregate { sized: true } as backend immediate

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Code is too big, and the error too unspecific to upload to an issue, if necesary it could be uploaded to Github. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (2036fdd24 2023-03-27) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2036fdd24f77d607dcfaa24c48fbe85d3f785823 commit-date: 2023-03-27 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` [](error: internal compiler error: /rustc/2eaeb1eee1b21772de8b935236d16ff8e03fdcf5/compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/mir/rvalue.rs:892:22: Couldn't translate Aggregate { sized: true } as backend immediate) ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/2eaeb1eee1b21772de8b935236d16ff8e03fdcf5/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1644:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f1cea42bf8a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h543e5a71eb1b5eeb at /rustc/2eaeb1eee1b21772de8b935236d16ff8e03fdcf5/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f1cea42bf8a -
